name: Deeper
body:
## Welcome to Deeper!
Deeper is a 2D Video Game Created by OrionDark7 with [Python](python.org) & [Pygame](pygame.org). It is a game set in the Depths of an unknown world, where you can Build, Dig, and Explore freely. It is coming soon this month (October 2016.). I will try to get some screenshots up ASAP.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
